name: Dark Mathworks MATLAB
description: When you're looking how to do different things on MATLAB on Mathworks documentation, your eyes may bleeding because of that white background everywhere and makes you blind. This little style helps your eyes be healthy while checking how to use MATLAB.
additional_info:
* 1.0 - 05/11/18 - Initial Release
